<title level="1" right="Hazard 12" pfs="">[Flensing Blades](/Hazards.aspx?ID=491)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Complex" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=30" />
<trait label="Haunt" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=88" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [GM Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=218) pg. 107 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Complexity** Complex

</column>

A whirling tornado of spectrally propelled glass and steel slices whatever it touches to ribbons.

---

**Stealth**
+25 (expert)

**Disable**
DC 35 [Thievery](/Skills.aspx?ID=50) (master) to precisely adjust the blades so that they destroy each other, or DC 38 [Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=46) (expert) to weaken the haunt; four successes are required to disable it

<column gap="tiny">

**AC** 33, **Fort** +27, **Ref** +25, **Will** +22

**Hardness**
20

**HP**
100 (BT 50)

**Immunities**
[critical hits](/Rules.aspx?ID=2190), [object immunities](/Rules.aspx?ID=2161), precision damage

**Weaknesses**
[vitality](/Traits.aspx?ID=509) 15

</column>

**Whirling Blades** <actions string="Reaction" /> **Trigger** Three or more creatures enter the area of the haunt; **Effect** Sharp fragments lift up from the ground and begin to spin in rapid circles taking up one 5-foot square. The haunt rolls initiative.

---
**Routine**
(3 actions) The tornado of blades uses 3 actions to move, traveling up to 30 feet with each action and dealing 2d10+10 slashing damage. Each creature in its path must attempt a DC 33 Reflex save. Each successful check to [disable](/Actions.aspx?ID=2411) this hazard reduces the haunt’s movement by 30 feet, and the fourth success disables it completely.  <%CRIT.EFFECTS#1702>

---
**Reset**
The haunt draws jagged shards back into its area over the course of an hour, after which it can trigger again.
